snippet: The jury agreed with Microsoft’s claim that Motorola broke agreements with standard-setting bodies to license certain patents at a fair and reasonable rate
abstract: Microsoft says jury in federal court decided in its favor in dispute over Motorola Mobility's licensing of so-called standard, essential patents used in Microsoft products; jury agreed with Microsoft’s claim that Motorola broke agreements with standard-setting bodies to license certain patents at a fair and reasonable rate
lead_paragraph: The jury agreed with Microsoft’s claim that Motorola broke agreements with standard-setting bodies to license certain patents at a fair and reasonable rate

headline.main: Microsoft Wins Jury Ruling in Motorola Patent Case
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Wins Jury Ruling In Motorola Patent Case
